name: squared
description: Converts HTML and SVG into any mobile or desktop UI framework with the flexibility and accuracy of Chrome. CSS Grid, Flexbox, and CSS/SMIL animations are also supported.

scripts.dev: tsc --inlineSourceMap false && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && cd ./android-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && cd ../chrome-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.prod: npm run clean && tslint -c tslint.json '**/*.ts' && tsc --inlineSourceMap false && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ./android-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../android-widget && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../chrome-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* && rimraf dist/* && rimraf temp/*
